name: NukeBox
description:
Nukebox is.. (currently)

A Prototype Character Controller,  A network / multiplayer development sandbox and a Offline FPS prototype.. All made in Unity..

Nukebox is very much, still in development.. Any questions, opinions, and feedback about bugs/glitches, features and direction is welcome..

Online is currently in a closed beta but enjoy the offline modes!!

Controls

  • Move - W A S D
  • Look - Mouse Move
  • Ctrl - Crouch / Slide
  • Shift - Toggle Run
  • Space - Jump

Weapons

  • Shoot - Left Click
  • Aim - Right Click
  • Melee - Middle Mouse Button
  • 3 - Select Auto Weapon
  • 4 - Select Shotgun
  • R - Reload
  • I - Inspect

Menu / Other

  • H - Help Menu
  • Escape - Close Game

TIPS:::

Weapons and Health Spawn on the two platforms throughout the game!

1 - Easter Egg!
